text: The Odd Couple II is a 1998 American comedy movie and the sequel to the 1968 movie The Odd Couple, directed by Howard Deutch and based on Neil Simon's play of the same name. It stars Jack Lemmon, Walter Matthau, Richard Riehle, Jonathan Silverman, Jay O. Saunders, Jean Smart, Rex Linn, Alice Ghostley, Barnard Hughes and Rebecca Schull. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1998 comedy movies Category:1990s road movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies directed by Howard Deutch Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies about old age
title: The Odd Couple II
